Description: Fragment of oval handle with gradual curve of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Red paint remains. Rectangular stamp. Clay fine pink-buff.
Curator's comments: Name Aglokritos. See A. Johnston, 'Fragmenta Britannica V' Bulletin of the Institute of Classical Studies 59 (2016) 47-8, noting Petrie's drawing and his misinterpretation as Agathokritos. Trimmed.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0652)
